creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil; randa and embroidered side seams; appliqué and embroidered neckline, rosette with radiating triangles; red ground cloth with narrow blue, white, green, yellow and orange stripes alternating with wide yellow stripes.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
